## Feature Description  
Clearly describe the feature or improvement you would like to see added to the FastPix iOS Video Data AVPlayer SDK.

---

## Problem Statement  
Is this feature request related to an existing problem or limitation?  
Explain what challenge you’re facing — for example, missing analytics, metadata limitations, playback tracking gaps, or issues while tracking AVPlayer, AVPlayerLayer, or AVPlayerViewController.

---

## Proposed Solution  
Detail the solution you are proposing.  
For example:  
- A new analytics event  
- Additional metadata fields  
- Improvements to videoChange handling  
- Expanded tvOS support  
- Better configuration for AVPlayer tracking  
- Enhanced integration API

---

## Alternatives Considered  
Describe any alternatives you explored.  
This may include:  
- Custom handling in the app  
- Workarounds using existing FastPix APIs  
- External tracking methods

---

## Use Case  
Provide a specific scenario where this feature would improve video analytics or SDK integration.  
Common examples include:  
- Tracking additional user engagement metrics  
- Handling playlist or episodic content  
- Passing custom metadata for business intelligence  
- Improving playback-quality monitoring  
- Using the SDK on tvOS environments

## Additional Context  
Add any supporting information, such as:  
- Code snippets  
- Expected metadata format  
- Example videoChange event usage  
- Mockups or logs  
- Links to relevant FastPix documentation
